title: Subchapter C - Fire, Marine, Casualty And Surety Insurers
content:
Subchapter C - Fire, Marine, Casualty And Surety Insurers

State Regulations

Part 105 - Operating Expense Classification For Annual Statement Purposes (§ 105.1 to 105.25)

Part 106 - Allocation Of Joint Expenses To Companies (§ 106.1 to 106.7)

Part 107 - Composition Of, And Allocation To, Expense Groups (§ 107.1 to 107.4)

Part 108 - Allocation To Lines Of Business (§ 108.1 to 108.3)

Part 109 - Allocation Of Salaries And Other Expenses (§ 109.1 to 109.4)

Part 110 - Installment Premiums (§ 110.1 to 110.2)

Part 111 - Statement of Actuarial Opinion and Actuarial Opinion Summary for Property/Casualty Insurers (§ 111.1 to 111.3)

Part 112 - Loss Portfolio Transfers (§ 112.0 to 112.7)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
